name: overgrow
caption: Overgrow

effect.short: Strengthens []{type:grass} moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.
effect.full: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its [HP]{mechanic:hp} remaining, its []{type:grass}-type moves inflict 1.5× as much [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.

flavorText:
Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s
HP is low.
